title: Santa Rosa Consulting Achieves Top Rankings As One of Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work in Healthcare for 2015 - Fourth Consecutive Year
text:
Santa Rosa ranked #21 in the Supplier Category and #13 in the Medium Sized Suppliers Category.
Nashville, Tennessee
Santa Rosa Consulting was recognized for the fourth consecutive year as one of the Best Places to Work in Healthcare by the leading industry publication, Modern Healthcare. A national provider of strategic advisory and information technology consulting services to the healthcare industry, Santa Rosa ranked #21 in the Supplier Category and #13 in the Medium Sized Suppliers Category. This distinction is based on a comprehensive analysis covering company policies, leadership, and employee workplace satisfaction.
Modern Healthcare revealed the ranked order of the 100 Best Places to Work in Healthcare for 2015 on Oct. 14th. This is the eighth year for Modern Healthcare to recognize the best places to work in healthcare while showcasing every segment of the industry, including providers, suppliers, and payers. A special supplement regarding the rankings was published along with the Oct. 19th issue of Modern Healthcare.
“At Santa Rosa, we are committed to maintaining a culture and infrastructure that supports our associates in their professional growth and their work/life balance,” said Laura O’Toole, executive vice president and chief people officer at Santa Rosa. “These top rankings, in conjunction with a fourth consecutive year of recognition, from Modern Healthcare validate our strides to provide a consistent, balanced work environment. When our associates are encouraged and supported, they’re able to deliver excellence for our clients.”
Modern Healthcare’s Best Places to Work in Healthcare recognizes outstanding employers in the healthcare industry on a national level. Employers are ranked based on analysis of business practices and detailed employee surveys on core areas of Leadership and Training, Culture and Communications, Role Satisfaction, Working Environment, Relationship with Supervisor, Training and Development, Pay and Benefits, and Overall Satisfaction.
“We’re pleased with the recognition and high rankings received by Modern Healthcare based on the direct feedback from our Associates,” said Mark Scruggs, executive vice president at Santa Rosa. “Recently, we were rated with the highest score by KLAS Research in their Go-Live Support market segment and we continue to achieve solid ratings in our implementation and staff augmentation capabilities. We’re honored to have received recognition and affirmation from our clients and now also our associates.”
About Santa Rosa Consulting
Santa Rosa Consulting provides management advisory services and technical consulting expertise across the full range of IT vendor products and systems, delivering solutions specifically designed to address the needs of the healthcare market. For more information, visit the company’s website at http://www.santarosaconsulting.com or call 866.944.4772.
